member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.Design.QueuePathEditor.EditValue
member.summary: Edits the value of the specified message queue, using the specified service provider.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.Design.QueuePathEditor.GetEditStyle
member.summary: Returns the editing style used by the method.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources used by the .

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageEnumerator.RemoveCurrent
member.summary: Removes the current message from the queue and returns the message to the calling application. Removing the message deletes it from the queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueueEnumerator.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources used by the .

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueuePermissionEntryCollection.AddRange
member.summary: Appends a set of specified permission entries to this collection.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources used by the .

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek
member.summary: Initiates an asynchronous peek operation by telling Message Queuing to begin peeking a message and notify the event handler when finished.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive
member.summary: Initiates an asynchronous receive operation by telling Message Queuing to begin receiving a message and notify the event handler when finished.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Create
member.summary: Creates a new queue at the specified path on a Message Queuing server.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator
member.summary: Creates an enumerator object for a dynamic listing of the public queues on the network.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.GetPublicQueues
member.summary: Retrieves all the public queues on the network.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek
member.summary: Returns a copy of the first message in the queue without removing the message from the queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByCorrelationId
member.summary: Peeks a message that matches a given correlation identifier.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekById
member.summary: Returns a copy of the message that has the specified message identifier without removing the message from the queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.PeekByLookupId
member.summary: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0. Peeks at a specific message from the queue. The message can be specified by a lookup identifier or by its position at the front or end of the queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive
member.summary: Receives the first message in the queue, removing it from the queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByCorrelationId
member.summary: Receives a message that matches a given correlation identifier.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveById
member.summary: Receives the message that matches the given identifier, removing it from the queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveByLookupId
member.summary: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0. Receives a specific message from the queue. The message can be specified by a lookup identifier or by its position at the front or end of the queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Send
member.summary: Sends an object to a queue.

member.name: Overload:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.SetPermissions
member.summary: Adds permissions to the current set. This controls who has access rights to queue properties and messages in the queue.
